attributes.action: Enable all Blue Badge holders to have full entitlement to the Motability Scheme.
attributes.additional_details: Current exclusions to the benefits of the Motability scheme include; those people who become disabled through immobility after age 65 and in an ageing population this is becoming an increasing problem also, their are younger people, who receive a disability benefit for their immobility but its considered to be of a lower level and they are not entitled to the benefits of the Motabilty scheme yet they can qualify for a Blue Badge and they have to personally finance their own equipment.
attributes.background: Currently, the Motability scheme is not available to Blue Badge holders who've proved their disability under a government recognised process but are not in receipt of certain benefits. Blue Badge holders need full access to the Motability scheme to enhance the quality of their lives.
